func.title: DigFreeRect

param.name: no_dig2objects
param.desc: Prevent objects from being dug out

param.name: no_instability_check
param.desc: Does not perform instability checks around dug pixels, i.e. prevents surrounding single pixels and liquids from becoming loose.

func.desc: Makes a rectangular hole in semi-solid materials. The return value is the amount of pixels that were dug free. If no_dig2objects is true, the dug out material does neither create objects according to the Dig2Objects in the *.ocm nor will the amount be stored in the internal buffer.

example.text: Makes a square hole in the middle of the landscape.
